name: adminforth
description: OpenSource Vue3 powered forth-generation admin panel

scripts.prepareDist: cp -r spa dist/spa && find plugins -type f ! -name '*.ts' -exec cp --parents {} dist/plugins \;
scripts.rollout: tsc && npm run prepareDist && npm version patch  && npm publish && cd documentation && npm run build && npm run deploy

author: devforth.io
